title: Transferring Account region from NA to Korean
body: Hi, I am still wondering if you guys still are not able to transfer my account from NA server to KR server since I have been suffering playing league without any skins and such narrow champ selects,, hope you guys are working on it since a lot of players would like to transfer their accounts too

replies.body: That region is run by a different support team, so we don't have the tools to assist with transferring or looking up accounts there.  I don't believe that the databases are connected, so you would need to create an account there.
